item.title: With a fresh slate, the work is well underway when it comes to the LA Kings power play
item.description: With a fresh slate, the work is well underway when it comes to the LA Kings power play Date Site Link 2022-10-03 [[LA Kings Insider]] With a fresh slate, the work is well underway when it comes to the LA Kings power play Contributors [[Zach Dooley]] Players Summary It’s the topic you’ve likely asked the most about this season.
